title: LF: Set-Filler Hall of Famers. Trimmed, Halved, or Faded!
author: njdunkin1

posts.post_title: LF: Set-Filler Hall of Famers. Trimmed, Halved, or Faded!
posts.post_content:
Anything from this list, I want! The card can be ripped in two, missing the whole back, or have a mustache drawn on it. Simply looking for an affordable way to add some key cards. Pics and price, via email or PM please!
[url]njdunkin1@gmail.com[/url] 

Here is the list!
Cobb red
Mathewson dark cap
Mathewson white cap
Mathewson portrait 
Hal Chase blue
Hal Chase pink
Cy Young portrait
Ed Plank (I kid!)
Rube Waddell throwing
Frank Chance, red and yellow
Joe Tinker, red
Iron Man McGinnity
Walter Johnson port
Walter Johnson action

Any others you think I may like, shoot me a PM!

Thank you!
NJ
A few nicer cards offered, but no flat beaters yet! List adjusted accordingly.
Any cards ripped in half today?
